text: The 2017 Nevada Wolf Pack football team represented the University of Nevada, Reno in the 2017 NCAA Division I FBS football season. The Wolf Pack were led by first–year head coach Jay Norvell and played their home games at Mackay Stadium. They were members of the West Division of the Mountain West Conference.2017 Nevada Wolf Pack Football Schedule They finished the season 3–9 and 3–5 in Mountain West play to finish in fourth place in the West Division. ==Previous season== The Wolf Pack finished the 2016 season 5–7 and 3–5 in Mountain West play to finish in a three–way tie for third place in the West Division and did not qualify for a bowl game. Head coach Brian Polian was replaced by Jay Norvell. ==Schedule== ==Game summaries== ===at Northwestern=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |1–1 |2007 |NW, 36–31 |} ===Toledo=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |0–3 |1997 |TOL, 31–13 |} ===Idaho State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |18–11 |1991 |NEV, 41–20 |} ===at Washington State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |1–2 |2014 |NEV, 24–13 |} ===at Fresno State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |20–27–1 |2016 |NEV, 27–22 |} ===Hawaii=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |12–9 |2016 |HAW, 38–17 |} ===at Colorado State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |3–11 |2015 |NEV, 28–23 |} ===Air Force=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |1–2 |2014 |AF, 45–38OT |} ===at Boise State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |13–28 |2014 |BSU, 51–46 |} ===San Jose State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |19–9–2 |2016 |SJSU, 14–10 |} ===at San Diego State=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |3–6 |2016 |SDSU, 46–16 |} ===UNLV=== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" |26–16 |2016 |NEV, 45–10 |} ==Players in the 2018 NFL Draft== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="" | Player || Position || Round || Pick || NFL Club |- align="center" bgcolor="" | Austin Corbett || G || 2 || 33 || Cleveland Browns |} ==Notes== ==References== Nevada Category:Nevada Wolf Pack football seasons Nevada Football
